job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO setenv NODEBUG yes setup 64b starver .DEV2 # echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' # if (! $?) then # set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` # set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` # set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` # else set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set f = 1 set l = 5000000 # endif foreach evtsFile(`cat $FILELIST`) echo "${evtsFile}" set filel1 = `basename $evtsFile .daq` set filel = `basename $evtsFile .root` set output = ${filel}.event.root if (! -r ${evtsFile}) continue; set logFile = ${filel}B.log # if ( -r $logFile) continue; set muFile = ${filel}.MuDst.root if (-r $muFile) continue; #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000,"P2014,TpxRaw,TpxClu2D,-l3onl,-fpd,-hitfilt,mtd,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,KFVertex,McTpcAna","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'","'${filel}.root'")' >& ${logFile} #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000,"P2018,TpxRaw,TpxClu,-l3onl,-fpd,-hitfilt,mtd,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,KFVertex,McTpcAna","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'","'${filel}.root'")' >& ${logFile} #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(100000,"P2018a,-l3onl,-fpd,-hitfilt,mtd,btof,BEmcChkStat,OGridLeak3D,useCDV,CorrX,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,KFVertex","'${evtsFile}'")' >& ${logFile} #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(100000,"P2018a,-l3onl,-fpd,-hitfilt,mtd,btof,BEmcChkStat,OGridLeak3D,useCDV,CorrX,OPr40,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,KFVertex,-picoWrite","'${evtsFile}'")' >& ${logFile} end root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(100000,"P2018a,-l3onl,-fpd,-hitfilt,mtd,btof,BEmcChkStat,OGridLeak3D,CorrX,OPr40,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,KFVertex,-picoWrite","'${evtsFile}'")' >& ${logFile} end
